reviewText: I discovered this film when I was researching for a "Gadgetry from behind the Iron Curtain" video project. It is a dense political-espionage drama, well-made, and the print and DVD picture quality are very good. There are some excellent model shots, and scenes of the Death Ray blowing stuff up (yay) but if it's a real Russian Buck Rodgers you're after, check out Cosmic Journey (Kosmicheskiy Reys: Fantasticheskaya Novella) Now THERE's some gadgetry.
